name: Mann Co. BLU
description:
A BLU Mann Co. theme for tumblr including the Dashboard, Messages, Blog, and New Post pages.

Please read additional info for font information!

Feedback and suggestions are appreciated!
additional_info:
Currently there is ONLY a BLU version because this was a personal edit I figured I'd share. If enough people want a red version I'll consider making one.

THESE FONTS WILL BREAK if you don't have them installed in your FONT folder. There are two ways to install these files.

-Go to "steamapps/[username]/team fortress 2/tf/resource" from the Steam folder and copy the fonts into your computer's font folder (MUST HAVE TF2 INSTALLED)
-Download the ZIP from the Artwork page on TF2.com. However, this only contains 2 out of 3 of the used fonts.
-Find a download elsewhere and be cautious (there's a reason I only said 2 ways, because this is just dumb)

Enjoy and let me know if there's anything else I need to fix!
